word: 1136. Why has it not been understood from the word of God that the work being done in medical missionary lines is a fulfilment of the scriptures? "Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city, and bring hither the poor, and the maimed, and the halt, and the blind. . . . Go out into the highways and hedges and compel them to come in, that my house may be filled."--R. and H., 1897, No. 21.
